::Savanna::

She transformed into her beast mode and walked forward so she could 
be seen.  She wanted this bot to know that she was friendly.  but she 
stayed wary incase of attack. She spoke into her link,"I am Savanna.  
Lioness and pride leader.  To whom do I have the pleasure of speaking 
to?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Savanna was the first to arrive at Phobias ship (Which mode is she 
> in?) Phobia observed the Maximal, deciding to get negotiations 
going 
> he opened a link.(Audio only)
> 
> " Greetings Maximal, to whom do I have the pleasure of meeting 
first?"
> 
> His scans were deffinite, this was the first one to respond to his 
> message.
>
